tours.title: Private Abu Dhabi City Tour
tours.description: Discover the best of Abu Dhabi as we take you to iconic landmarks like the breathtaking Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the luxurious Emirates Palace Hotel, and the vibrant Heritage Village.
tours.description2: Discover the ultimate Abu Dhabi City Tour with convenient pickup and drop-off right from your location in Dubai! Travel in comfort and style as our professional drivers take you on a seamless journey in our spotless, well-maintained vehicles. Explore the best of Abu Dhabi, visiting iconic landmarks like the majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the opulent Emirates Palace Hotel, and the culturally rich Heritage Village. Savor the local charm with a stop at the Dates Market, and capture stunning photos outside the iconic Ferrari World. Embark on an unforgettable adventure in Abu Dhabi â€“ a day full of memories awaits!

inclusions.professional_guide: Professional Guided Tour of Abu Dhabi
inclusions.sheikh_zayed_mosque: Sheikh Zayed Mosque (1 Hour 30 Minutes Stop)
inclusions.marina_mall: Marina Mall of Abu Dhabi (Drive Through)
inclusions.dropoff: Drop Off To Your Home / Hotel

tours.title: Private Evening Desert Safari Dubai
tours.description: Experience the magic of the Arabian desert with our Private Evening Desert Safari. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, camel rides, and traditional entertainment under the stars.
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable desert adventure with our Private Evening Desert Safari. Experience the thrill of dune bashing in a private Land Cruiser, witness a breathtaking desert sunset, and enjoy traditional Arabian hospitality at our desert camp. The evening includes cultural performances, delicious BBQ dinner, and various desert activities.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Home/Apartment/Residence anywhere in Dubai
inclusions.dune_bashing: Dune Bashing by Desert Safari License Professional Driver
inclusions.welcome_drinks: Traditional welcome with Arabic Tea, Coffee
inclusions.dinner: International Buffet Dinner with BBQ (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian)
inclusions.light_show: Full Light and Sound display on stage and around the Camp
inclusions.belly_dance: Two Live Belly Dance Show on traditional Arabic Music
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your Hotel/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.driver_license: All drivers have License from U.A.E govt. for Safari
inclusions.vehicle_insurance: All vehicles are fully insured and as per security requirements of UAE laws

tours.title: Private Morning Desert Safari
tours.description: Experience the thrill of the desert in the morning with our Private Morning Desert Safari. Enjoy dune bashing, sand boarding, and witness the beautiful sunrise over the desert.
tours.description2: Start your day with an exhilarating morning desert safari adventure. Experience the thrill of dune bashing in a private 4x4 Land Cruiser, witness the breathtaking sunrise over the desert, and enjoy various desert activities including sand boarding. Perfect for those who want to experience the desert's beauty in the morning hours.

inclusions.pickup: Pick from your Apartment, Hotel, Residence, Villa or Near Airport
inclusions.vehicle: Pick by Toyota Suv 4x4 Land Cruiser Desert Safari License driver
inclusions.photo_stop: Adventurous drive to reaching the high Dune for photo stop
inclusions.sunrise: See Beautiful Sun Rising Scene & Capture Moments
inclusions.sand_boarding: Sand Boarding slide experience from high dunes
inclusions.dune_bashing: 40 to 45 Minutes Dune Bashing at Red Dunes Desert
inclusions.refreshments: Cold Drink, Water Bottle, Soft Juice Refreshment
inclusions.return_drive: Thrill & fun drive from desert to reaching road
inclusions.dropoff: Drive back to dubai & drop back your location

tours.title: Private Abu Dhabi Tour with Mosque, Louvre and Qasr al Watan
tours.description: Experience the cultural richness of Abu Dhabi with visits to the iconic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Louvre Abu Dhabi, and the magnificent Qasr Al Watan.
tours.description2: Embark on a cultural journey through Abu Dhabi's most iconic landmarks. Visit the breathtaking Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, explore the world-class Louvre Abu Dhabi museum, and discover the architectural marvel of Qasr Al Watan. This private tour offers a perfect blend of culture, history, and modern architecture.

inclusions.entry_fees: Entry fees to all attractions included

tours.title: Safari with Bab AL Shams Dinner
tours.description: Experience an unforgettable evening of desert adventure followed by a luxurious dinner at the iconic Bab Al Shams resort.
tours.description2: Combine the thrill of desert safari with the luxury of Bab Al Shams resort. Experience dune bashing in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, capture stunning desert photographs, and enjoy a sumptuous international buffet dinner with live entertainment at one of Dubai's most iconic desert resorts.
tours.title2: Desert Safari with Bab Al Shams
